current_boss.name: The Winter Dragon of Apathy
current_boss.description: A frost-wyrm that threatens to freeze Bostonians in their homes during the cold months. Only community gatherings can melt its icy grip!

upcoming_bosses.name: The Spring Bloom Elemental
upcoming_bosses.description: A chaotic nature spirit encouraging everyone to get outside and explore Boston's awakening parks

upcoming_bosses.name: The Summer Heatwave Titan
upcoming_bosses.description: A fire giant that demands beach trips and outdoor festivals to be appeased

upcoming_bosses.name: The Fall Harvest Golem
upcoming_bosses.description: An autumn construct requiring apple picking, pumpkin patches, and cozy gatherings
